messages.content:
Namaste, Divya.

Aapka message mila. 12 December 2005, sham 5 baje, Delhi. Bilkul. Pehle toh, beta, yeh confirm karna zaroori hai ki yeh details bilkul sahi hain, kyunki poora analysis is par nirbhar karta hai.

Agar yeh details sahi hain, toh aapka Ascendant... well, we call it Lagna... almost certain hai ki Kanya Rashi (Virgo) ban raha hai. Kanya Lagna wale log thode vicharshil hote hain, aur har cheez ko perfect karne ki koshish karte hain. *They are very analytical and detail-oriented.*

Aapka Moon Sign, Chandra Rashi, Aries hai, which shows you have a lot of energy and are very independent. And currently, Venus Dasha chal rahi hai. Venus, yaani Shukra, prem, romance, aur art ka grah hai. *This period might bring focus on relationships and creative pursuits.*

Ab, Divya, yeh toh sirf ek chhoti si jhalak hai. To give you a deeper understanding, I need to know, specifically, aapke jeevan mein kya chal raha hai? What are you most concerned about? Career, marriage, family? Aap mujhe bataiye, aur main aapko jyada detail mein bata paunga.

Tell me what's on your mind, and we'll delve deeper. Aashirwad!
